summary:
Wu-Tang Clan is a legendary hip-hop group from New York City, formed in 1992. The group consists of nine talented rappers, including RZA, GZA, and Ol' Dirty Bastard. They gained fame for their unique style and powerful lyrics, bringing new life to East Coast hip-hop.

Their first album, *Enter the Wu-Tang (36 Chambers)*, is considered a classic. It was followed by *Wu-Tang Forever*, which won a Grammy nomination. Over the years, they released more albums, and their impact on hip-hop remains strong, even launching the careers of other artists.
title: Wu-Tang Clan
